item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls of the day: Nvidia, Apple, CoreWeave, Broadcom, Tesla, Amazon & more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Buy this AI cloud stock ahead of earnings, says Citi
item.description: In a Tuesday note, the bank maintained its buy rating on the cloud computing stock and raised its price target.

item.title: Analysts grow concerned about Palantirâ€™s 'extreme' valuation even after solid earnings beat
item.description: While praising Palantir's strong business, analysts remained concerned over the stock's elevated valuation.

item.title: Broadcom is a top pick thanks to accelerating demand from hyperscalers, says Jefferies
item.description: Jefferies sees shares of Broadcom rising another 32% from here.

item.title: The charts on this aerospace stock show a compelling buying opportunity, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Boeing is an example of a stock that looks compelling from a risk/reward standpoint following a negative response to earnings.
